vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Halff Associates, Inc. to provide engineering services for storm drainage system improvements in the Mill Creek, Peaks Branch, East Peaks Branch watersheds - Not to exceed $5,994,800.00 - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage (C) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
